action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

The grid is a simple crossword puzzle with four rows and four columns. The first row has the letters "A" and "B" in the first two cells, while the third cell has the letter "C". The second row has the letters "D" and "E" in the first two cells, while the third cell has the letter "F". The third row has the letters "G" and "H" in the first two cells, while the third cell has the letter "I". The fourth row has the letters "J" and "K" in the first two cells, while the third cell has the letter "L". The remaining cells are empty.
